about_the_game:
BELPHEGOR, the Paragon of Impiety!


  • Terrify your rivals as the new wickedly crafted Archfiend, Belphegor
  • Employ Belphegor's Dark Art, Scour the Wastes
  • Test your mettle against Belphegor's single-player Chronicle
  • Command your new Personal Guard, the Servitors of Belphegor
  • Build fiendish machines from within your diabolical Stronghold



A new Archfiend emerges! Take the Infernal Throne as Belphegor, the Paragon of Impiety, a diabolical inventor whose contraptions are designed to serve one wicked purpose; to corrupt, weaken, and enslave!



Bring hell to its knees with your dark inventions! Belphegor's Dark Art, Scour the Wastes, offers a new ritual that constructs Dark Pylons to damage nearby Legions and Places of Power, while feeding Belphegor manuscript fragments in his offerings. Dark Pylons act as a simple buildable Place of Power, sickening nearby rival units with choking sulfurous fumes.



Belphegor's Chronicle - Empire of Ash. His genius ignored and mocked, Belphegor aims nothing short of rebuking heaven itself. His first step is taking the Infernal Throne - not an easy prospect given five very powerful and equally ambitious rival Archfiends. But Belphegor's sanctum overflows with blueprints and plans for diabolical machines the likes of which Hell has never seen. All that remains is the fateful order to start construction...

The Belphegor Archfiend DLC Contains the following content;


  • New Archfiend model and throneroom
  • New Dark Art, including placeable Dark Pylon units
  • New Chronicle single-player story
  • New Personal Legion model and card
  • New Praetor model to lead them with

content_descriptors.notes: Solium Infernum is set in a fictional Hell, and as such features dark fantasy, occult themes and occasional violence.
